Defines
Check parameter
MCTM exported constants

Defines

#define IS_MCTM(x)   (IS_MCTM0(x))
 Used to check parameter of the MCTMx.
#define IS_MCTM0(x)   (x == HT_MCTM0)
#define IS_MCTM_COMPLEMENTARY_CH(x)
 Used to check parameter of the complementary output channel.
#define IS_MCTM_COMUS(x)   ((x == MCTM_COMUS_STIOFF) || (x == MCTM_COMUS_STION))
 Used to check parameter of the COMUS.
#define IS_MCTM_OIS(x)   ((x == MCTM_OIS_LOW) || (x == MCTM_OIS_HIGH))
 Used to check parameter of the channel output idle state.
#define IS_MCTM_BREAK_STATE(STATE)
 Used to check value of MCTM break control state.
#define IS_MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY(POLARITY)
 Used to check value of MCTM break polarity.
#define IS_MCTM_CHAOE_STATE(STATE)
 Used to check value of MCTM automatic output enable control state.
#define IS_MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL(LEVEL)
 Used to check value of MCTM lock level.
#define IS_MCTM_OSSI_STATE(STATE)
 Used to check value of MCTM OSSI state.
#define IS_MCTM_OSSR_STATE(STATE)
 Used to check value of MCTM OSSR state.

#define IS_MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY (   POLARITY)
Value:
(((POLARITY) == MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY_LOW) || \
                                             ((POLARITY) == MCTM_BREAK_POLARITY_HIGH))

Used to check value of MCTM break polarity.

Definition at line 232 of file ht32f5xxxx_mctm.h.

#define IS_MCTM_BREAK_STATE (   STATE)
Value:
(((STATE) == MCTM_BREAK_ENABLE) || \
                                     ((STATE) == MCTM_BREAK_DISABLE))

Used to check value of MCTM break control state.

Definition at line 237 of file ht32f5xxxx_mctm.h.

#define IS_MCTM_COMPLEMENTARY_CH (   x)
Value:
(((x) == TM_CH_0) || ((x) == TM_CH_1) || \
                                     ((x) == TM_CH_2))

Used to check parameter of the complementary output channel.

Definition at line 219 of file ht32f5xxxx_mctm.h.

#define IS_MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL (   LEVEL)
Value:
(((LEVEL) == MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_OFF) || \
                                     ((LEVEL) == MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_1) || \
                                     ((LEVEL) == MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_2) || \
                                     ((LEVEL) == MCTM_LOCK_LEVEL_3))

Used to check value of MCTM lock level.
